metadata.title: CVE-2019-11476 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An integer overflow in whoopsie before versions 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1,0.2.62ubuntu0.1, 0.2.64ubuntu0.1, 0.2.66, results in an out-of-bounds writeto a heap allocated buffer when processing large crash dumps. This resultsin a crash or possible code-execution in the context of the whoopsieprocess.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11476` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwhoopsie0 - 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1
whoopsie - 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: whoopsie package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1').
